title: Tangled Hairbeast
content:
Tangled Hairbeast is a monster that requires level 18 Guard to attack, although it's a very difficult fight at such a level without Rare or Epic gear, we recommend a Guard level of at least 28 and a Bow or Plumbatae before attempting to farm for XP or Items.

The Tangled Hairbeast will drop items between level 27 and 33.
